      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy stored in a clock and a dam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie gespeichert in einem Taktgeber und in 
einer Verdammung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie enregistrée dans une horloge et un 
barrage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia armazenada em um pulso de disparo e em 
uma represa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia memorizzata in un orologio ed in una 
diga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια που καταχωρείται σε ένα ρολόι και ένα 
φράγμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía salvada en un reloj y una presa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a clock (top) and a dam (bottom), both stores gravitational potential energy. Potential energy is released when the clock's weights fall down or the dam's water flows down.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Clock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy store</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">generator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydroelectric power station</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Taktgeber (Oberseite)
und eine Verdammung (Unterseite), mögliche Gravitationsenergie beider
Speicher. Mögliche Energie wird freigegeben, wenn die Gewichte 
des Taktgebers abfallen, oder das Wasser der Verdammung unten fließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une horloge (dessus) et
un barrage (bas), énergie potentielle de la gravité de les deux 
mémoires. De l'énergie potentielle est libérée quand les 
poids de l'horloge tombent vers le bas ou l'eau du barrage coule vers 
le bas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um pulso de disparo 
(alto) e uma represa (fundo), energia potencial gravitacional de ambas
as lojas. A energia potencial está liberada quando os pesos do 
pulso de disparo caem para baixo ou a água da represa flui para 
baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un orologio (parte 
superiore) e una diga (parte inferiore), energia potenziale 
gravitazionale di entrambi i depositi. L'energia potenziale è 
liberata quando i pesi dell'orologio cadono o l'acqua della diga 
fluisce giù.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα ρολόι (κορυφή) και 
ένα φράγμα (κατώτατο σημείο), βαρύτητας πιθανή ενέργεια και των
δύο καταστημάτων. Η πιθανή ενέργεια εκδίδεται όταν 
πέφτουν κάτω τα βάρη του ρολογιού ή οι ροές ύδατος του 
φράγματος κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un reloj (tapa) y una 
presa (fondo), energía potencial gravitacional de ambos almacenes. 
La energía potencial release/versión cuando caen los pesos del
reloj abajo o fluye el agua de la presa abajo.</string>
          </description>
